Uses of Class
exceptions.ClientUnavailableException

  • Packages that use ClientUnavailableException 
    Package Description
    server  

    • Uses of ClientUnavailableException in server

      Methods in server that throw ClientUnavailableException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void CollectoServer.doError​(java.lang.String errorMessage, CollectoClientHandler handler)
      Sends a error message to the client.
      void CollectoServer.doGameOver​(CollectoClientHandler handler1, CollectoClientHandler handler2, java.lang.String reason, java.lang.String name)
      When a game is ended, this method should be called to notify the clients.
      void CollectoServer.doMove​(int move1, int move2, CollectoClientHandler handler1, CollectoClientHandler handler2)
      Sends the updated move(s) in the game to both clients in the game.
      void CollectoServer.doNewGame​(CollectoClientHandler hdler1, CollectoClientHandler hdler2)
      Starts a new Collecto game with the clients given in the parameters.
      void CollectoServer.handleCorrectMove​(int[] choice, CollectoServerGame game)
      Handles the correct choice of client and apply to the game.
      void CollectoServer.handleHello​(CollectoClientHandler handler)
      Handles the hello send by a client by replying: HELLO~"serverName".
      void CollectoServer.handleList​(CollectoClientHandler handler)
      Handles the list request from the client.
      void CollectoServer.handleLogin​(java.lang.String clientInput, CollectoClientHandler handler)
      Handles the login send by a client by adding it to all the online users and to the client.
      void CollectoServer.handleMove​(java.lang.String clientInput, CollectoClientHandler handler)
      Handles the move sent by the client.
      void CollectoServer.handleQueue​(CollectoClientHandler handler)
      Handles the queue send by the client by adding or removing it from the queue, also checks if game can be played.
      void CollectoClientHandler.sendToClient​(java.lang.String msg)
      Sends a command to the client.
